name: As Crônicas dos Caçadores
description:
As Crônicas dos Caçadores

a game made by Gabriel Alonso.

Numa Terra antiga, mais antiga ainda do que na estória comum dos RPGs, onde a magia sequer existia, um grupo de sábios de dentro do reino começa a fazer experimentos com o que eles consideram magia, no entanto, ela tem seu preço... É o começo da mana, do uso de habilidades formidáveis e principalmente, de uma guerra entre aqueles que são contra e os que são a favor. Você está preparado para embarcar nessa jornada?

In an ancient Earth, even more ancient than the common story of RPGs, where magic didn't even exist, a group of wise mans from the kingdom started to make experiencies with what they considered magic, however, it has its price... It's the beginning of mana, of formidable abilities and mainly, of a war between those who are against and those who are for. Are you prepared to join this journey?

  • Controles/Controls:

Z - Ação principal.

X - Cancelar.

Setas - Move.

Z - Main Action.

X - Cancel.

Arrows - Move.

  • Credits:

Todos os créditos num arquivo .txt dentro da pasta do jogo.

All the credits in a .txt file inside the game folder.

  • Localization:

Game entirely in Brazilian Portuguese, but playable if you don't know this language. Soon, when the game get released, I'll try to do the localization if I have enough time.

Hope you enjoy!

developed with RPG Maker VX Ace.
